column2: A small reclusive clearing within the woods where young druids can commune with the spirits of the forest and ask for boons and assistance.
A druidic enclave within the forest, complete with multiple ancients and other forest spirits making the area their home.
A special area in the capital set aside for the Cenarion Circle. The Circle druids coordinate tirelessly to restore balance to the wilds and to bring prosperity to the land.
